title: Wine Journal 2024
content:
## Wine Tasting Notes 2024

### Preferences
Primary: Pinot Noir, Burgundy, Barolo
Secondary: Champagne, Sancerre

### January - Domaine de la Romanee-Conti 2018
- Region: Burgundy, France
- Tasting: Cherry, earth, mushroom, long finish
- Rating: 98/100
- Paired with: Aged Comte cheese

### February - Giacomo Conterno Barolo 2016
- Region: Piedmont, Italy
- Tasting: Rose petal, tar, dried cherry
- Rating: 95/100
- Paired with: Osso buco in Le Creuset

### March - Kistler Pinot Noir 2020
- Region: Sonoma Coast
- Tasting: Red fruit, vanilla, silky tannins
- Rating: 92/100

### Wine Trip Plans
- Napa Valley: Domaine Carneros, Etude, Bouchaine
- Tuscany: partner trip (using Delta SkyMiles)

### Budget: Premium - willing to splurge on special bottles

title: Travel Bucket List
content:
## Travel Bucket List

### Upcoming
1. **Paris** - Fine dining, wine bars, Four Seasons stay
2. **Tuscany** - Wine region tour, villa rental
3. **Napa Valley** - Weekend wine tasting
4. **Aspen** - Winter ski trip

### Dream Trips
- Tulum - beach + wellness retreat
- Tokyo - omakase tour
- Provence - lavender season

### Travel Style
- Luxury: Ritz-Carlton, Four Seasons
- Fly Delta business class (SkyMiles Platinum)
- Also fly American for domestic
- Marriott Bonvoy Gold for hotels
- Prefer aisle seat for long flights

### Frequency: 8-10 trips per year

### Always Pack
- Premium skincare routine
- Wine opener
- Bailey's favorite toys (golden retriever)

title: Fitness Routine
content:
## Weekly Fitness Routine

### Goal: Stress Management

### Schedule (4x/week)
- Monday: 30min Peloton Power Zone
- Wednesday: 20min Low Impact + Meditation ride
- Friday: 45min Peloton scenic ride
- Saturday: Pilates (studio or Apple Fitness+)

### Apps
- Peloton app (primary)
- Apple Fitness+ (supplementary)

### Supplements
- Collagen peptides (morning)
- Omega-3 fish oil
- Vitamin C

### Wellness
- Monthly spa visit
- Quarterly wellness retreat
- Night owl schedule: 11pm-7am

### Hiking
- Occasional weekend hikes
- Starved Rock State Park (favorite)
- Waterfall Canyon trail

title: Home Renovation Plans
content:
## 3BR Condo Renovation - Modern Farmhouse

### Living Room
- Reclaimed wood floating shelves (for Sonos + decor)
- Statement light fixture over dining table
- Linen curtains (soft, lived-in feel)
- Pet-friendly performance fabric sofa (for Bailey)

### Kitchen
- Open shelving for Le Creuset collection display
- Pot rack above island
- Reclaimed wood cutting board display
- Herb mason jars on windowsill
- White shiplap accent wall

### Smart Home
- Nest thermostat (installed)
- Sonos in 3 rooms
- Ring doorbell
- Considering Hue lights for accent lighting

### Pet Considerations
- Golden retriever Bailey needs durable fabrics
- Crypton or indoor/outdoor upholstery
- Easy-clean floor in entryway

### Style: Modern farmhouse
### Budget: Premium

title: Marketing Reading List
content:
## Marketing & Business Reading

### Currently Reading
- "Crossing the Chasm" by Geoffrey Moore
- "Made to Stick" by Chip & Dan Heath

### Completed 2024
- "Building a StoryBrand" by Donald Miller
- "Influence" by Robert Cialdini
- "Hooked" by Nir Eyal

### To Read
- "Obviously Awesome" by April Dunford
- "The Long Game" by Dorie Clark
- "Unreasonable Hospitality" by Will Guidara

### Work Context
VP of Marketing at Chicago firm
Tools: HubSpot, Google Analytics, Notion, Slack, Figma
Style: hybrid work, meeting-heavy
Podcasts: How I Built This, The Daily

### Notes
Focus on ROI frameworks and attribution modeling.
Need to improve board presentation skills.

title: Gift Guide - Luxury
content:
## Gift Guide 2024

### For Partner
- Wine subscription (premium Burgundy/Barolo quarterly)
- Luxury watch (considering Omega or TAG Heuer)
- Budget: $200-500

### For Parents
- Gourmet food basket (artisan cheese, charcuterie)
- Garden tools (high-quality pruners, kneeling pad)
- Budget: $100-200

### For Self
- Le Creuset new pieces (braiser, baking dish)
- Skincare upgrade (SkinCeuticals CE Ferulic)
- Nordstrom shopping trip

### For Bailey (golden retriever)
- Organic treats
- New plush bed
- Kong toys

### Shopping Style: Luxury
Brands: Nordstrom, Reformation, Theory, Tory Burch, Le Creuset
Budget range: $100-500 for special occasions

title: Skincare Routine
content:
## Premium Skincare Routine

### Morning
1. Gentle cleanser
2. Vitamin C serum (SkinCeuticals CE Ferulic)
3. Hyaluronic acid
4. SPF 50 (Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen)

### Evening
1. Double cleanse: oil cleanser then gel
2. Retinol (0.5% strength, building up)
3. Peptide cream (Augustinus Bader The Rich Cream)
4. Eye cream

### Weekly
- Exfoliate 2x with enzyme mask
- Sheet mask 1x

### Monthly
- Alternating: microneedling or hydrafacial at spa

### Supplements (Supporting Skin Health)
- Collagen peptides daily
- Omega-3
- Vitamin C

### Budget: Premium - invest in quality
### Age: 45, focus on anti-aging and glow

title: Dinner Party Menus
content:
## Dinner Party Menu Collection

### French Bistro Night (8 guests)
- Appetizer: Charcuterie & cheese board
- Wine: Burgundy Pinot Noir
- Main: Coq au Vin in Le Creuset Dutch oven
- Sides: Roasted root vegetables, arugula salad
- Dessert: Pots de creme in Le Creuset ramekins
- Music: Soft jazz on Sonos

### Italian Night (6 guests)
- Appetizer: Bruschetta with heirloom tomatoes
- Wine: Barolo
- Main: Osso buco
- Dessert: Tiramisu
- Table setting: linen napkins, brass candlesticks

### Casual Sunday Brunch
- Quiche Lorraine
- Fresh fruit & pastries
- Mimosas with fresh-squeezed orange juice
- Cappuccino (single origin beans)

### Cooking Style: Weekends only
Cuisines: French, Italian, Japanese omakase, farm-to-table
Delivery for weeknights: Uber Eats, Caviar

title: Career Goals 2024
content:
## Career Goals - VP of Marketing

### Q1-Q2 Goals
- Build ROI framework using HubSpot + Google Analytics
- Reduce CAC by 15%
- Improve board presentation skills

### Q3-Q4 Goals
- Launch brand refresh campaign
- Explore AI tools for marketing automation
- Mentor 2 junior team members

### Tools to Master
- Advanced HubSpot workflows
- Google Analytics 4 attribution
- Figma for presentation design
- Notion for team documentation

### Professional Development
- Attend 2 marketing conferences
- How I Built This live event
- Executive coaching quarterly

### Work Style
- Hybrid office (3 days in, 2 remote)
- Meeting-heavy schedule
- Use Slack for team communication
- Notion for project documentation

title: Bailey's Care Guide
content:
## Bailey - Golden Retriever Care

### Basic Info
- Breed: Golden Retriever
- Age: 4 years
- Weight: 65 lbs
- Vet: Lincoln Park Animal Hospital

### Daily Routine
- Morning walk: 30 min
- Evening walk: 45 min
- Feeding: 2x daily, high-quality kibble + fresh toppers

### Health
- Annual checkup: February
- Flea/tick: monthly preventative
- Supplements: joint supplement, fish oil

### Favorite Activities
- Hiking (Starved Rock, Waterfall Canyon)
- Dog park in Lincoln Park
- Swimming (summer lake visits)

### Gear
- Harness: Ruffwear Front Range
- Bed: Casper dog bed
- Toys: Kong, rope toys, tennis balls

### Pet-Proofing Home
- Performance fabric furniture
- Nest camera for monitoring when away
- Baby gate for kitchen during cooking
